doc:
Carlotta Monti https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carlotta_Monti 0 Carlotta Monti (January 20, 1907 – December 8, 1993) was an American film actress, who was W. C. Fields' companion in his last years. Born Carlotta Montijo in Los Angeles, California, Monti appeared in B-movies including Kiss of Araby (1933), Tarzan the Fearless (1933) and Night Cargo (1936), usually cast as an exotic temptress. She met Fields in 1932 and their relationship lasted until his death in 1946. She had small roles in his films Man on the Flying Trapeze (1935) and Never Give a Sucker an Even Break (1941). Carlotta_Monti ( January_20_,_1907 – December_8_,_1993 ) was an_American_film_actress , who was W._C._Fields '_companion in his_last_years . Born Carlotta_Montijo in Los_Angeles , California , Monti appeared in B-movies including Kiss of Araby_(_1933_) , Tarzan the_Fearless_(_1933_) and Night_Cargo ( 1936_) , usually_cast as an_exotic_temptress . She met Fields in 1932 and their_relationship lasted until his_death in 1946 . She had small_roles in his_films_Man on the_Flying_Trapeze_(_1935_) and Never_Give a_Sucker an Even Break (_1941_) .
